scripts.tunnel:setup: mkdir .vscode && podman run -d -v "./.vscode:/root/.vscode" -v "./:/workspace" --name delete-me alpine:latest tail -f /dev/null
scripts.tunnel:install: podman exec -it delete-me sh -c "apk add --no-cache curl tar bash && curl -Lk 'https://code.visualstudio.com/sha/download?build=stable&os=cli-alpine-x64' --output vscode_cli.tar.gz && tar -xf vscode_cli.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin && rm vscode_cli.tar.gz"
scripts.tunnel:run: podman exec -it delete-me sh -c "cd /workspace && code tunnel --accept-server-license-terms --name delete-me & while [ ! -f /root/.vscode/cli/token.json ]; do sleep 1; done && pkill code"
scripts.tunnel: pnpm run tunnel:setup && pnpm run tunnel:install && pnpm run tunnel:run && pnpm run tunnel:cleanup
